resources.string: Please note: \nUnfortunately, mandates cannot be edited. We suggest you reject if anything is incorrect and arrange with your service provider to resubmit a corrected mandate.
Disputing this payment could put your account with your service provider in arrears
Unpaid debit orders will negatively affect your credit score.
If all the information on your mandate correctly matches the debit order your dispute may be rejected.
I hereby agree to take responsibility for any claim, whether by me or any other third party however it may arise, in regard to this payment being credited by Absa (or any other bank)
Select an account to view approved mandates
Select an account to view suspended mandates
You have no approved mandates on this account
You have no suspended mandates on this account
Suspending debit orders can negatively affect your credit score.
It is your responsibility as the client to inform the party who raised the debit order of your request to suspend as Absa does not do this.

Notwithstanding this instruction and/or anything contained herein, you shall have no claim/defence of any nature whatsoever against Absa, should the latter willfully, negligently or otherwise fail to execute this instruction.

You also accept full responsibility and liability for all damage suffered by Absa and/or all claims (inclusive of all legal costs) of whatever nature instituted against Absa arising from or caused by the execution of this instruction.

I hereby indemnify the bank against any claim however arising, whether by me or any third party in respect of such cheque or stopping of the payment thereof and any cost for which Absa may be liable. \nFurthermore I shall have no claim against the Bank in the event of such cheque being credited for any reason whatsoever by Absa or any other Bank.
R %s has been refunded to your account
The dispute amount and debit day match the mandate. Please contact your service provider should you need to make changes.
Remember to contact your service provider to notify them of the suspension and to make further arrangements.
These details match the details we have on our system from your mandate. Please contact your service provider for further assistance.

DebiCheck is a security feature that allows you to approve or reject new debit orders against your account. 

Simply approve any debiCheck debit orders that you recognise and reject any that you do not.

This service is a free service offered to all customers.
Debit in contravention of payer\'s authority
Previously stopped via Mandate Suspension advice
The amount or the collection date differs from what I agreed to
Why are you rejecting this debit order?
The amount or the collection date differs from what I agreed to

DebiCheck allows you to approve or reject debit orders on your account.\n\nDebiCheck is a new standard for debit orders in South Africa. Before any money gets deducted from your account, you will need to approve a DebiCheck mandate.
I agree to the above Terms & Conditions
Click here to view debit orders
Your mandate is being processed and will soon be available to view on your active mandate list in debiCheck.
If you have selected \"None of these reasons\", your credit provider should be in contact with you soon.
Amended fields have been marked with an asterisk (*)
